Articles.Content:
I watched Masterminds last night and there was a funny analogy Zach gave.  I don't remember all of it, but at one point he says "No one cares about rocket boosters.  They just fall off and burn up in the atmosphere."  I tried to find the rest of it online or in a transcript but the only transcript I found was way off and said "thrusters" instead of "rocket boosters".  The analogy is kind of hard to explain out of context, but just the humanization of a rocket booster and saying "No one cares about rocket boosters" was just a funny statement to me.

Edited December 19, 2016 by AaronLS
